snippet: The number of people filing applications for unemployment benefits rose by 15,000 to 297,000, probably as a result of temporary auto plant shutdowns.
lead_paragraph: The number of people filing applications for unemployment benefits rose by 15,000 to 297,000, probably as a result of temporary auto plant shutdowns.

headline.main: Jobless Claims Jump to Highest Level Since February
headline.print_headline: Jobless Claims Jump to Highest Level Since February
